contract_details.description: Systematically clean and consolidate business intelligence modules while preserving all functionality. Focus on eliminating duplication, improving test coverage, and organizing code structure.
contract_details.background: Agent-5 has expertise in consolidation and business intelligence. This contract focuses on cleanup while leveraging that expertise to ensure we don't lose functionality during reorganization.
objectives: Audit all business intelligence and analysis modules
Identify and eliminate code duplication in BI components
Increase test coverage for BI modules to >85%
Reorganize BI code structure while preserving functionality
Create comprehensive documentation for BI systems
Validate all changes don't break existing BI functionality
deliverables: Comprehensive BI module audit report with cleanup recommendations
Eliminated code duplication in BI components (target: 50% reduction)
Increased test coverage for all BI modules (>85%)
Reorganized BI code structure with clear module boundaries
Updated documentation for all BI systems and APIs
Functional validation report confirming no regressions
technical_requirements: Python BI/analysis module analysis and refactoring
Test coverage analysis and improvement tools
success_criteria: Zero functional regressions in BI systems
Test coverage >85% for all BI modules
Eliminated >50% of code duplication in BI components

contract_history.details: Created cleanup-focused contract for Agent-5 business intelligence consolidation
